participant_2.background:
I train my dogs and listen to death metal.
I'm visiting my family for the first time in a long time and I'm really excited to see them!
i like long walks on the beach.
i just bought new hoop earrings.
I often take my best friend to my grandmother's place for a visit.

content.text: Hey there! How is your day going?
It's going well! I'm excited to be visiting my family for the first time in a long time.
Oh that's great! I'm sure you're going to have a great time.
Thank you! I hope so too.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go on long walks on the beach, train my dogs, and listen to death metal.
Those all sound like fun things to do. I've always wanted to go on a long walk on the beach.
It's so relaxing! I would definitely recommend it.
What kind of dogs do you have?
I have a German Shepherd and a Beagle.
Oh those are both great breeds! I've always wanted a German Shepherd.
They're great dogs! They're both very loyal and protective.
That's what I've heard. I'm sure they're a lot of fun to have around.
They are! They're always up for playing and cuddling.
I'm glad to hear that.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to try new things, even if they're out of my comfort zone. I also love to drink Mountain Dew.
Oh that's interesting. I'm not much of a risk taker, but I do love Mountain Dew.
It's my favorite drink! I drink it every day.
That's a lot of Mountain Dew!
I know, I know. I'm addicted.
Haha, well at least you're happy.
I am! I'm glad you're having a great time on your trip.
Thank you! I am too
